channel.title: How the heck do i get my server running
channel.description: I can log onto it with using 127.0.0.1 but..not with the ip. the ip is pimpscape.serveftp.com but i cant use that ip to log on...I port forwarded already like it said to. ANd i have no-ip client thing downloaded

item.title: How the heck do i get my server running
item.dc:creator: @mage_burst mage_burst
item.description:
@mage_burst wrote:

ok this is what you want to do, make sure u have a valid client for ur source, make sure u go in ur source’s directory compile and then run, when you goto log in, you don’t have to type a IP at all if it’s just you connecting, if you have people joining, i highly suggest u to use no-ip.org, download it make a new host, type what u want the ip to be, choose no-ip.org .info ect.

If you have anymore questions please private message me.

Don’t spam the fourms.

Read full topic
item.source: How the heck do i get my server running
